mn75:5.3: bhūnahuno → bhūnahanassa (sya-all, km) | bhūnahu → bhūnahano (sya-all, km)
mn75:5.11: agaru āroceyyāmi taṁ → āroceyyametaṁ (bj, pts1ed); ārocessāmi tassa (sya-all, km)
mn75:7.1: Ayañca hi → ayañca hidaṁ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn75:10.7: paricārayamāno → paricāriyamāno (sya-all, pts1ed) | tūriyehi → turiyehi (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed) | vassike cattāro → vassike pāsāde cattāro (sya-all, km)
mn75:17.2: tathā tathāssa → tathā tathā tasseva (sya-all, km, mr)
mn75:20.2: mañjiṭṭhakāni → mañjeṭṭhakāni (bj, mr); mañjeṭṭhikāni (sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn75:20.6: telamalikatena sāhuḷicīrena → telamasikatena sāhuḷacīvarena (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
